item.title: sendFrame246 Question
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

public void sendFrame246(int MainFrame, int SubFrame, int SubFrame2) { outStream.createFrame(246); outStream.writeWordBigEndian(MainFrame); outStream.writeWord(SubFrame); outStream.writeWord(SubFrame2); flushOutStream(); }

I’ve seen it is used like this: sendFrame246(14769, 250, item ID);

But what does the 14769 and the 250 do? I guess the position of where the Item must be showen? but how do i know then where 14769 and 250 is?

Could someone give me some information, thanks.

Read full topic
